titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit for infant formula rebates paid under the Special Supplemental Nutrition Program for Women, Infants, and Children.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/22/2010--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a business-related tax credit for 10% of the infant formula rebates paid or incurred under the special supplemental nutrition program for women, infants, and children.
